div.p: NOT EVEN A VULCAN CAN KNOW
IS THAT A REQUEST OR DEMAND?

p.span: WHAT IS LEFT OF ME PERISH,
AS YOU NOW LEAVE YOUR OWN SEED
OF AN ADAM AND AN EVE
AND THE RECORDS OF OUR TRAVELS

div.p: WE MEAN ONLY THAT YOU SHOULD
THAT'S WHY I CALLED YOU ALL
DO I HEAR A NEGATIVE VOTE?
TO MAKE THE ERRORS WE DID.
YOU SAID HOW GOOD IT WAS
YES. I WANTED TO BE CERTAIN
A LIVING BODY ARE TOO GREAT.
WE HAVE MUCH WORK TO DO.

p.span: OF ONE SO CLOSE TO YOU.
